# Example: ERP CORE data

## Loading Python modules

```{python}
from step.datasets.erpcore import get_erpcore
from step.epoching import EpochingConfig, EpochingPipeline
from step.input import InputConfig, InputPipeline
from step.preproc import PreprocConfig, PreprocPipeline

n400_files = get_erpcore(component="N400", participants=3)

input_config = InputConfig(n400_files["raw_files"][0], n400_files["log_files"][0])
input_pipeline = InputPipeline(input_config)
input_pipeline.run()

preproc_config = PreprocConfig(downsample_sfreq=256, montage="biosemi64")
preproc_pipeline = PreprocPipeline(preproc_config)
preproc_pipeline.run(input_pipeline.raw)

epoching_config = EpochingConfig(triggers=[211, 212, 221, 222])
epoching_pipeline = EpochingPipeline(epoching_config)
epoching_pipeline.run(preproc_pipeline.raw)  # No "log" because it has additional rows

epoching_pipeline.epochs
```
